name: News Corp
short_description: News Corp is a media company involving in the film, television, network programming, satellite television and newspaper industries.
overview:
News Corp is the world's largest media conglomerate company.
News Corporation is a diversified global media company with operations in eight industry segments: filmed entertainment; television; cable network programming; direct broadcast satellite television; magazines and inserts; newspapers and information services; book publishing; and other. The activities of News Corporation are conducted principally in the United States, Continental Europe, the United Kingdom, Australia, Asia and Latin America.
[Fox Interactive Media (FIM)](http://www.crunchbase.com/company/fox-interactive-media) oversees News Corporation's Internet business operations.
News Corp's subsidiaries include:
- [MySpace](http://www.crunchbase.com/company/myspace)
- [Slingshot Labs](http://www.crunchbase.com/company/slingshot-labs)
- [WSJ.com](http://www.crunchbase.com/company/wall-street-journal)
